name: eslint-config-devtips
author: Caleb Meredith <calebmeredith8@gmail.com>
description: A shared eslint config for all DevTips production JavaScript code

scripts.release-patch: npm test && git checkout master && npm version patch && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-minor: npm test && git checkout master && npm version minor && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-major: npm test && git checkout master && npm version major && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
